%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

612 0 translate
90 rotate

/font {findfont exch scalefont setfont} bind def
.8 1 scale

/newpage {
	showpage
	612 0 translate
	90 rotate
	.8 1 scale
} bind def

%% --------------------- Template Procedures
%% ------------------------------- Single-Line Entry
/card1 {
	28 /Helvetica-Bold font
	exch
	dup stringwidth pop
	2 div neg 274 add 448 moveto
	show
	16 /Helvetica-Bold font
	dup stringwidth pop
	2 div neg 274 add 448 20 sub moveto
	show
	} bind def

%% ------------------------------- Single-Line Entry with Title
/tcard1 {
	28 /Helvetica-Bold font
	exch
	dup stringwidth pop
	2 div neg 274 add 458 moveto
	show
	16 /Helvetica-Bold font
	dup stringwidth pop
	2 div neg 274 add 458 20 sub moveto
	show
	16 /Helvetica-Bold font
	dup stringwidth pop
	2 div neg 274 add 458 40 sub moveto
	show
	} bind def
